Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Industrial Product/Industrial Aid/Pharmaceutical Excipient/Drug Vehicle/DC-Cholesterol Liposome
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A cationic cholesterol derivative mixed with dimethylaminoethane-carbamoyl and sonicated to form small unilamellar vesicles that can complex with DNA, DNA/protein complexes and other drug complexes and mediates the delivery into the cytosol from the endosome compartment. (NCI)
